Beach Go'er Bundle (Male)
kDesc
Summer is finally here. Bundle includes plaid slip-on shoes, cargo shorts, and a un-buttoned plaid shirt. [#Legal]
L'été est enfin là. L'ensemble comprend des chaussures sans lacets à carreaux, un short treillis et une chemise à carreaux ouverte. [#Legal]
Endlich ist der Sommer da. Das Paket beinhaltet karierte Slipper, eine Cargohose und ein offenes, kariertes Hemd. [#Legal]
Finalmente è arrivata l'estate. Include mocassini a scacchi, pantaloncini cargo e una camicia a scacchi aperta. [#Legal]
Al fin ha llegado el verano. El conjunto incluye mocasines a cuadros, shorts con bolsillos y una camisa a cuadros desabrochada. [#Legal]
드디어 여름이 왔습니다. 이 번들은 플레이드 단화, 카고 반바지, 그리고 플레이드 셔츠를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Summer is finally here. Bundle includes plaid slip-on shoes, cargo shorts, and a un-buttoned plaid shirt. [#Legal]
夏天終於來臨。服裝組包括格子無帶便服鞋、工裝褲及不扣鈕的格子襯衫。 [#Legal]
夏天終於來臨。服裝組包括格子無帶便服鞋、工裝褲及不扣鈕的格子襯衫。 [#Legal]
Summer is finally here. Bundle includes plaid slip-on shoes, cargo shorts, and a un-buttoned plaid shirt. [#Legal]
